attributes.action: Attendance of the Queen at th anniversary of D Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
She was a serving member of the armed forces at the time, daughter of our then monarch and the one person who personifies our links with the second world war.

Keep the prime minister out of it as he is not fit to lick the boots of the people who served and died.

rejection.details: Your petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
